channel.title: Saving :S
channel.description: Hello. Sometimes when people log out they just completly reset :S Does anyone know how to stop this ? Also , does anyone have the code for an auto save and a command like ::save so your always sure its saved ? And if you do , please tell me what to search/edit :D Thanks in advance :cool:[br][size=1]Posted on: November 13, 2007, 10:33:38 AM[/size][hr]Sorry for the double post but , can't you just look in your source for "save" or something and gimme that code and tell me where you found it ? Since im waiting here like 5 hours for an answer and only 8 views ? (3 by myself)

item.title: Saving :S
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Bitch Java Is My Bitch™
item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch wrote:

You have the gay pk4r pk4r source? Yeah i know its not really the saving, people just get reset when theres alot of peoples, if not whatever. Here…

public void save(int ID) { client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[ID]; c.savechar(); c.savemoreinfo(); c.saveStats(); c.appendConnected(); //c.savecharbackup(); }

I have it in a handler, so you fix it, if you do, then you deserve it, if not, you fail.

Read full topic

item.title: Saving :S
item.dc:creator: @r.v.d.p r.v.d.p
item.description:
@r.v.d.p wrote:

search in something like a command of: kickall or something (idk what it is now) then you should find somewhere System.out.println(“game saved for all players!”); around that you find the command to use the void where players all got saved, copy that command and paste it in your process() then if it’s laggin like hell try to make something with ints that it’s saving all players every 5 seconds or something

Read full topic
